original_text: but the Babylonian army pursued the king and overtook him in the plains of Jericho. All his soldiers were separated from him and scattered,
korean_text: 갈대아 군대가 그 왕을 뒤쫓아가서 여리고 평지에서 그를 따라 잡으매 왕의 모든 군대가 그를 떠나 흩어진지라

sentences.original_text: the Babylonian army pursued the king
and overtook him in the plains of Jericho
All his soldiers were separated from him
